content:
I do not have access to snoop dogg's current plans or future career aspirations. however, in a 2018 interview with vanity fair, snoop dogg hinted that he already has plans for a follow-up cookbook to "from crook to cook" and that he was excited to share more of his favorite recipes and personal stories with his fans.

regarding opening up his own restaurant, snoop dogg has been involved in various food-related projects, including a recent partnership with dunkin' donuts to launch a line of beyond meat sandwiches. he has also made several appearances as a guest judge on various food competition shows like masterchef and martha & snoop's potluck dinner party.

overall, it's clear that snoop dogg's passion for food is real, and he is likely to continue exploring opportunities to share his love for cooking with the world through various projects, whether it's another cookbook or something more substantial like a restaurant.
